EmailTemplate.description: When a case is opened, this email is sent to the customer
EmailTemplate.name: Customer Care Case Open (Phone)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Calling BlueWave Customer Care
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for your call. Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} is being evaluated and we are assigning the most appropriate customer care representative to fix this issue. We will return your call as soon as possible.
If your issue gets resolved during your conversation with a BlueWave representative, your case will be closed and you can expect a short survey to rate your experience.
Thanks for being part of the BlueWave Community - All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
